mapper.insert: insert into b_data_field( table_id, field_name, field_type, field_comment, creater, create_time, state, iscancel, remark ) values ( #{tableId}, #{fieldName}, #{fieldType}, #{fieldComment}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{iscancel}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update b_data_field set table_id = #{dataField.tableId}, field_name = #{dataField.fieldName}, field_type = #{dataField.fieldType}, field_comment = #{dataField.fieldComment}, creater = #{dataField.creater}, create_time = #{dataField.createTime}, state = #{dataField.state}, iscancel = #{dataField.iscancel}, remark = #{dataField.remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, table_id AS tableId, field_name AS fieldName, field_type AS fieldType, field_comment AS fieldComment, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_field where id = #{id}

select id, table_id AS tableId, field_name AS fieldName, field_type AS fieldType, field_comment AS fieldComment, creater, create_time AS createTime, state, iscancel, remark from b_data_field where 1=1 limit #{page.offset},#{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into b_data_field
table_id,
field_name,
field_type,
field_comment,
creater,
create_time,
state,
iscancel,
remark,
#{tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fieldComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update b_data_field
table_id = #{dataField.tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
field_name = #{dataField.fieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_type = #{dataField.fieldType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
field_comment = #{dataField.fieldComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{dataField.creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{dataField.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{dataField.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iscancel = #{dataField.iscancel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{dataField.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
